title: Two Bedroom Apartment Available Now in Palo Alto!
posting_body: Two Bedroom Apartment Available Now in Palo Alto!
This two bedroom one bathroom apartment in Palo Alto is available now!
Located within the University South neighborhood, this apartment is just blocks away from University Avenue, downtown Palo Alto shops, restaurants, Heritage Park and other amenities.
This unit is tucked away in a flag lot, and is a townhome style unit with the living room and kitchen downstairs, and the two bedrooms and a Jack-and-Jill style bathroom upstairs.
Experience the authenticity of a Palo Alto apartment with vintage hardwood flooring and historic windows throughout.
Unit comes with one off-street parking space.
Deposit is equal to one (1) months rent.
Applicants subject to credit and background checks.
All Wilbur Properties tenants will need to go through an application process.
Each application is $50 per person over the age of 18.
Please be aware of the following tenant criteria prior to setting up an appointment:
A credit score of greater than 700
Gross household income of three (3) times or greater than the asking rent
Professionally managed by Wilbur Properties CAL DRE# 00823559
